home-intro-heading: Hi, I’m Firdovsi Rzaev, a Frontend Developer.
home-features-desc: Crafting modern, responsive, and user-friendly web experiences with modern technologies. With a focus on clean code and seamless design.
home-feature-reponse-desc: Every project I build is fully responsive, ensuring seamless user experiences across all devices—whether it’s a mobile, tablet, or desktop screen.
home-feature-modern-web-desc: I am proficient in using the latest frontend technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React. My goal is to create scalable, high-performance applications.
home-feature-git-desc: I use Git and GitHub for version control, enabling efficient collaboration and code management. All my projects are tracked with detailed commit history for easy navigation.
